title: 662: MICHAEL SAYLOR SAYS BITCOIN WILL SKYROCKET 300X IN THE LONG RUN HITTING $14 MILLION PER BTC!!!!!
description:
MicroStrategy CEO, Michael Saylor says once Bitcoin passes the market cap of gold, around $11 trillion currently, nothing will stop BTC.

Saylor, a true Bitcoin bull who currently holds 105,000+ BTC on his corporate balance sheet, sees Bitcoin capable of reaching a market cap of $300 trillion in the long run along with a $14M BTC price.

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit our YT channel at http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
